revised_title: The Origin of Magnesian Rocks and Mineral Springs
tldr: The author discusses the origin of magnesian rocks and mineral springs, focusing on the deposits from natural waters and the role of evaporation in forming these rocks. They also explore the connection between saline waters containing carbonate of magnesia and alkaline springs with carbonate of soda. The author analyzes various mineral springs and their compositions, providing insights into the geological processes involved in the formation of these rocks and springs.
